summary: Testing of Trading AI System iteration 4 completed. All 13 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI fully functional. Telegram Channel Management (CRUD operations) and Alpaca Broker endpoints verified working. TelegramChannelManager component successfully tested with add/toggle/delete channel operations.
passed_tests: Health Check - GET /api/health returns healthy with all services operational
Telegram Channel List - GET /api/telegram/channels/list returns channel array
Telegram Channel Add - POST /api/telegram/channels/add creates new channel
Telegram Channel Add Duplicate - Returns 400 for duplicate channel
Telegram Channel Add Empty Username - Returns 400 for empty username
Telegram Channel Delete - DELETE /api/telegram/channels/{username} removes channel
Telegram Channel Delete Nonexistent - Returns 404 for nonexistent channel
Telegram Channel Toggle - PUT /api/telegram/channels/{username}/toggle toggles enabled status
Telegram Channel Toggle Nonexistent - Returns 404 for nonexistent channel
Broker Config - GET /api/broker/config returns Alpaca paper trading config
Broker Balance - GET /api/broker/balance returns $100,014.58 account balance
Broker Positions - GET /api/broker/positions returns 2 positions (ETHUSD, XRPUSD)
Channel Status - GET /api/telegram/channels/status returns monitor info
Frontend Settings Page - Navigation and tab switching works correctly
Frontend TelegramChannelManager - Add channel via form works
Frontend TelegramChannelManager - Channel list displays correctly with Aktiv status
Frontend TelegramChannelManager - Toggle and delete buttons functional
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_telegram_channels.py (Created new test file for Telegram Channel CRUD and Alpaca Broker)
seed_data_creation: Test channel 'testsignals' was pre-added by main agent and is visible in channel list
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new Telegram Channel Management endpoints working correctly: list, add, delete, toggle. Alpaca broker configured for paper trading with ~$100K balance and 2 open positions (ETHUSD, XRPUSD). TelegramChannelManager component integrated in Settings page under Telegram tab. Bot @traiding_r2d2_bot is active and receiving signals. Default channels @eveningtrader and @fatpigsignals are automatically monitored.
